medical_history.chief_complaint: Achy diffuse abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior to presentation, starting at 9 am the previous day after breakfast. The pain worsened and was associated with nausea. The patient denies fevers/chills, and the constipation has resolved.
medical_history.family_history: No history of polyuria, diabetes insipidus, diabetes mellitus, or cancer.
